query:
SELECT g.id, g.nome, COUNT(gl.lojaId) as totalLojas
FROM gestores g
LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId
WHERE g.nome LIKE '%Carlos Eduardo%'
GROUP BY g.id, g.nome;
